UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents the profile of the user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

name.description: The display name of the user.

aboutMe.description: A detailed section about the user.

bio.description: A brief biography of the user, used for education.

fullName.description: The full name of the user.

profilePhotoUrl.description: URL of the user's profile photo.

educationPhotoUrl.description: URL of the user's education photo.

Skill.title: Skill
Skill.description: Represents a skill of the user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Skill entity.

percentage.description: The user's proficiency percentage in the skill.

Technology.title: Technology
Technology.description: Represents a technology the user is proficient in.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Technology entity.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project in the user's portfolio.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Project entity.

Certificate.title: Certificate
Certificate.description: Represents a certificate earned by the user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Certificate entity.

issuer.description: The organization that issued the certificate.

date.description: The date the certificate was issued.

link.description: A link to the certificate or its credential.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. Only the authenticated user can read/write their own profile.

/users/{userId}/skills/{skillId}.description: Stores skills for a user. Only the user can manage their own skills.

/users/{userId}/technologies/{technology.description: Stores technologies for a user. Only the user can manage their own technologies.

/users/{userId}/projects/{projectId}.description: Stores projects for a user. Publicly readable, but only writable by the owner.

/users/{userId}/certificates/{certificat.description: Stores certificates for a user. Publicly readable, but only writable by the owner.

/contactMessages/{contactMessageId}.description: Stores contact form submissions. Publicly writable, admin-only readable.
